items.name: InventorySync
items.description: A cloud-based inventory management system designed for small businesses to track stock, manage orders, and generate real-time analytics. The application streamlined operations for clients, reducing manual errors by 30%.

items.name: ConnectSphere
items.description: A social networking platform for professionals to connect, share insights, and collaborate on projects. Features include real-time chat, profile customization, and secure authentication with JWT.

items.name: EduTrack
items.description: An e-learning platform for schools to manage courses, assignments, and student progress. Integrated with a RESTful API and cloud storage, it improved student engagement by 25%.

items.name: HealthMonitor
items.description: A mobile-friendly health tracking app that allows users to log symptoms, schedule appointments, and receive reminders. Built with a focus on accessibility and user-friendly design.

items.name: AI Monitor
items.description: A mobile-friendly health tracking app that allows users to log symptoms, schedule appointments, and receive reminders. Built with a focus on accessibility and user-friendly design.
